    Set up recruitment dynamics for simulation

    Setup_Sim_Rec.Rd

    Set up recruitment dynamics for simulation

    Setup_Sim_Rec(
  n_yrs,
  n_regions,
  n_sexes,
  n_sims,
  do_recruits_move,
  base_rec_sexratio,
  rec_sexratio_vary,
  base_r0,
  r0_vary,
  base_h,
  init_sigmaR,
  sigmaR,
  recruitment_opt,
  recdev_opt
)

    Arguments

    n_yrs

    Number of years

    n_regions

    Number of regions

    n_sexes

    Number of sexes

    n_sims

    Number of simulations

    do_recruits_move

    whether recruits move == 0, don't move, == 1 move

    base_rec_sexratio

    base recruitment sex-ratio value

    rec_sexratio_vary

    whether recruitment sex-ratio varies. Options include: constant

    base_r0

    base R0 or mean recruitment value

    r0_vary

    whether r0 or mean recruitment varies. Options include: constant

    base_h

    base steepness value

    init_sigmaR

    Sigma R for initial devs

    sigmaR

    Sigma R for everything else

    recruitment_opt

    == 0, mean recruitment

    recdev_opt

    == 0, global rec devs, == 1, local rec devs
